scripts.build:
mkdir -p dist \
&& tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outFile dist/script.d.ts \
&& esbuild --bundle --sourcemap --platform=browser --target=es2015 --outfile=dist/script.js main.ts \
&& cp -rt dist index.html node_modules/leaflet/dist/images node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css \
&& cp -rt dist/images *.svg \
&& magick dist/images/marker-icon-2x.png -gravity center -background none -extent '%[fx:max(w,h)]x%[fx:max(w,h)]' dist/images/favicon.png \
&& { zopfli dist/*.html dist/*.css dist/script.* dist/images/*.svg || true; }
